body:
Hi @alalazo @ArangoGutierrez,

In Spack for Singularity installation the latest available is `master` & `3.4.1`, Is there any plan to have version `3.5.2` available in future? We would like it very much to test it on our HPC site.

Thank you
Amjad
title: Singularity Version 3.5.2 Availability Prospect in Spack
